########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    average_and_save.py
    compass.py
    findmax_and_save.py
    save_antenna_calib.py
    phase_correct.py
    phase_offset_est.py
    beamform_1d.py
    beamform_2d.py
    music_1d.py DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/doa
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-doa)
set(GR_TEST_PYTHON_DIRS ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/swig)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_antenna_correction ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_antenna_correction.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_MUSIC_lin_array ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_MUSIC_lin_array.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_autocorrelate ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_autocorrelate.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_calibrate_lin_array ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_calibrate_lin_array.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_find_local_max ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_find_local_max.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_MUSIC_arb_array ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_MUSIC_arb_array.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_beamform ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_beamform.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_calibrate_arb_array ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_calibrate_arb_array.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_beamform_1d ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_beamform_1d.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_beamform_2d ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_beamform_2d.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_music_1d ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_music_1d.py)
